languages.text: "А третий и последний Вольный Торговец внезапно гибнет в результате предательского удара собственного Мастера шепотов. Простор стремительно остается без защитников в тот самый момент, когда сообщение с Империумом прервано разбушевавшимся варпом. Фактически, он может рассчитывать лишь на меня... и на вас, если вы будете следовать моим инструкциям".

"And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."
languages.original_text: "А третий и последний Вольный Торговец внезапно гибнет в результате предательского удара собственного Мастера шепотов. Простор стремительно остается без защитников в тот самый момент, когда сообщение с Империумом прервано разбушевавшимся варпом. Фактически, он может рассчитывать лишь на меня... и на вас, если вы будете следовать моим инструкциям".

The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Koronus has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

Basically, all the Koronus has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

Basically, all the Koronus has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

Basically, all the Koronus has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

languages.text: 「3代目にして最後の自由開拓者が思いがけず自らの囁きの主に裏切られ命を落とした。ちょうど帝国との通信が歪みの嵐で遮られているタイミングで、エクスパンスは庇護者を急速に失いつつある。つまり、エクスパンスが頼れるのは私のみ…そして私の指示に従ってくれるのなら、お前もだ」
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: 「3代目にして最後の自由開拓者が思いがけず自らの囁きの主に裏切られ命を落とした。ちょうど帝国との通信が歪みの嵐で遮られているタイミングで、エクスパンスは庇護者を急速に失いつつある。つまり、エクスパンスが頼れるのは私のみ…そして私の指示に従ってくれるのなら、お前もだ」

languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

languages.text: “而第三位，也就是最后一位行商浪人离奇身亡，被她自己的低语之主从背后捅了刀子。科罗努斯扩区和帝国之间的通讯被汹涌的亚空间干扰，而偏偏是在这种时候，它又二连三地失去了它的保护者。负责守护扩区的人，基本只剩我一个了……如果你愿意听从我的指示，那就是你我两人。”
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: “而第三位，也就是最后一位行商浪人离奇身亡，被她自己的低语之主从背后捅了刀子。科罗努斯扩区和帝国之间的通讯被汹涌的亚空间干扰，而偏偏是在这种时候，它又二连三地失去了它的保护者。负责守护扩区的人，基本只剩我一个了……如果你愿意听从我的指示，那就是你我两人。”

languages.text: «Y la tercera y última Comerciante Independiente ha muerto repentinamente, traicionada por su propio maestro de susurros. La Extensión está perdiendo a sus protectores rápidamente en un momento en el que la disformidad interfiere en las comunicaciones con el resto del Imperium. Ahora mismo, solo cuenta conmigo... y con usted, si sigue mis instrucciones».
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: «Y la tercera y última Comerciante Independiente ha muerto repentinamente, traicionada por su propio maestro de susurros. La Extensión está perdiendo a sus protectores rápidamente en un momento en el que la disformidad interfiere en las comunicaciones con el resto del Imperium. Ahora mismo, solo cuenta conmigo... y con usted, si sigue mis instrucciones».

languages.text: « Enfin, la troisième et dernière libre-marchande a péri de manière tout à fait inattendue, poignardée dans le dos par son propre maître des murmures. Les Étendues perdent tous leurs protecteurs un à un au moment même où un Warp déchaîné perturbe les communications avec l'Imperium. En résumé, ce secteur ne peut plus compter que sur moi... et sur vous, si vous suivez mes instructions. »
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin, la troisième et dernière libre-marchande a péri de manière tout à fait inattendue, poignardée dans le dos par son propre maître des murmures. Les Étendues perdent tous leurs protecteurs un à un au moment même où un Warp déchaîné perturbe les communications avec l'Imperium. En résumé, ce secteur ne peut plus compter que sur moi... et sur vous, si vous suivez mes instructions. »

languages.text: "Und die dritte und letzte Freihändlerin ist unerwartet verstorben, von hinten erstochen von ihrem eigenen Meister des Geflüsters. Die Ausdehnung verliert rasch ihre Beschützer, und zwar genau dann, als die Kommunikation mit dem Imperium durch den tobenden Warp gestört wird. Im Prinzip hat die Ausdehnung nur noch mich ... und Euch, falls Ihr meinen Anweisungen folgt."
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Und die dritte und letzte Freihändlerin ist unerwartet verstorben, von hinten erstochen von ihrem eigenen Meister des Geflüsters. Die Ausdehnung verliert rasch ihre Beschützer, und zwar genau dann, als die Kommunikation mit dem Imperium durch den tobenden Warp gestört wird. Im Prinzip hat die Ausdehnung nur noch mich ... und Euch, falls Ihr meinen Anweisungen folgt."

languages.text: "Üçüncü ve son Hür Tacir ise kendi Fısıltı Üstadı tarafından sırtından bıçaklanarak beklenmedik bir anda öldü. İmparatorluk ile iletişim, azgın öteboyut nedeniyle sekteye uğrarken Enginlik, koruyucularını bir bir kaybediyor. Özet olarak Enginlik'te bir tek ben kaldım, bir de sen... O da talimatlarımı takip edersen."
languages.original_text: "And the third and final Rogue Trader has unexpectedly perished, stabbed in the back by her own Master of Whispers. The Expanse is swiftly losing its protectors right when communication with the Imperium is being disrupted by the raging warp. Basically, all the Expanse has left is me... and you, if you follow my instructions."

traits.locale_text: "Üçüncü ve son Hür Tacir ise kendi Fısıltı Üstadı tarafından sırtından bıçaklanarak beklenmedik bir anda öldü. Enginlik, koruyucularını bir bir kaybediyor, İmparatorluk ile iletişim de azgın öteboyut nedeniyle sekteye uğruyor. Özet olarak Enginlik'in elinde tek kalan kişi benim ve eğer talimatlarımı takip edeceksen, bir de sensin."
